subject: Basketball (College)
Halls of Fame
Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rick Pitino, who has led three teams to the Final Four, winning two N.C.A.A. championships, was among those enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame.
snippet: Rick Pitino, who has led three teams to the Final Four, winning two N.C.A.A. championships, was among those enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame.
